forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind around 12 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Areas Of Fog then Mostly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog before 9am. Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 9 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle veil of fog lingers, cloaking the city in a silver haze. The air, still and cool, whispers promises of clarity as the sun ascends, coaxing the mist to retreat. By mid-morning, expect a gradual lifting of the fog, revealing a mostly sunny day laced with soft warmth—a high bubbling around 70 degrees yet tempered to a comfortable 67 as the afternoon unfolds. A mild west-southwest wind will swirl through, offering a refreshing dance to those taking to the streets.

For those stepping out this morning, a light jacket or a layered ensemble will be wise, providing comfort against the lingering chill while allowing for adaptability as the sun graces the city. Consider a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or a visit to a local café, savoring a warm brew while watching the city come to life. The enchanting sights of the Bay Bridge juxtaposed against the waking skyline will be a perfect backdrop to a day marked by the gentle shift from fog to sun.
